api/JMRSDKExampleSnippets.ChangeRaycastM.keywords: Class ChangeRaycastMaterial Changes Raycast Material to the focused object when select button is triggered. Inheritance Object ChangeRaycastMaterial Implements ISelectClickHandler Namespace : JMRSDKExampleSnippets Assembly : cs.temp.dll.dll Syntax public class ChangeRaycastMaterial : MonoBehaviour, ISelectClickHandler Fields laser PointerLaserUnity holds reference to the material of raycast line renderer Declaration public PointerLaserUnity laser Field Value Type Description PointerLaserUnity Methods OnSelectClicked(SelectClickEventData) On select button click assign the focused object material to the raycast material. Declaration public void OnSelectClicked(SelectClickEventData eventData) Parameters Type Name Description SelectClickEventData eventData Data related to select click event Implements ISelectClickHandler

index.html.title: Raycast Material | JMR Samples
index.html.keywords: Raycast Material Example for customizing material of visible Raycast. Scripts ChangeRaycastMaterial.cs Example to change Raycast Material to the focused object when select button is triggered. Changing raycast material to another material. cs PointerLaserUnity laser = FindObjectOfType<PointerLaserUnity>(); laser.LineMaterial = material; How to use? Download and unzip this project. Open the project using Unity Hub. Download and import the latest version of JMRSDK package. Open and play the RaycastMaterial scene from Assets/Scenes folder.
